amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $2,500,000 for the study of geospatial visualization technologies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1258 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1258 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S9391; text: CR S9391) To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $2,500,000 for the study of geospatial visualization technologies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1258 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1258 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Roberts.
